buster-shot.name: Buster Shot
buster-shot.description: The user fires a series of small plasma shots at the opponent to inflict damage.  The number of shots fired depends on how much faster the user is than their target. This ability's power increases if the user if holding a buster charge.

buster-charge.name: Buster Charge
buster-charge.description: The user takes a defensive stance and charges themselves to completely restore depleted weapon energy! When used by a support robot, this ability can optionally charge an ally instead of the user!

buster-relay.name: Buster Relay
buster-relay.description: The user relays any buster charges, core shields, or stat changes they are currently holding to another robot on their side of the field!

mega-buster.name: Mega Buster
mega-buster.description: The user charges to build power and raise their own defense stat. If used again after charging, this ability will release a powerful energy shot that inflicts massive damage!

mega-ball.name: Mega Ball
mega-ball.description: The user generates a powerful ball-shaped explosive that rocks back and forth at their feet.  At the end of the turn, the user kicks the ball at the target to deal damage and break through core shields!

mega-slide.name: Mega Slide
mega-slide.description: The user quickly slides toward the target at blinding speed, inflicting damage with a {RECOVERY2}% chance of critical hit!

bass-buster.name: Bass Buster
bass-buster.description: The user charges to build power and raise their their own attack stat. If used again after charging, this ability will release a powerful energy shot that inflicts massive damage!

bass-crush.name: Bass Crush
bass-crush.description: The user summons a large tablet that hovers behind a target and crushes its spirits. This causes the target to receive double damage from attacks for the next six turns.

bass-baroque.name: Bass Baroque
bass-baroque.description: The user swiftly summons a dark aura around the target that inflicts massive damage with a {RECOVERY2}% chance of critical hit!

proto-buster.name: Proto Buster
proto-buster.description: The user charges to build power and raise their own speed stat. If used again after charging, this ability will release a powerful energy shot that inflicts massive damage!

proto-shield.name: Proto Shield
proto-shield.description: The user creates a large reflective shield that hovers in front of a target and bolsters its defenses.  This causes the target to receive half damage from attacks for the next six turns.

proto-strike.name: Proto Strike
proto-strike.description: The user unleashes a giant, lightspeed energy blast at the target to inflict massive damage with a {RECOVERY2}% chance of critical hit!

roll-buster.name: Roll Buster
roll-buster.description: The user charges to build power and restore a bit of their own life energy. If used again after charging, this ability will release an energy shot that severely lowers the target's defense stat!

roll-swing.name: Roll Swing
roll-swing.description: The user swings a hand-held weapon at the target to deal damage and break through super blocks! The exact weapon used for this ability and the resulting damage appear to rotate with each turn that passes...

disco-buster.name: Disco Buster
disco-buster.description: The user charges to build power and restore a bit of their own life energy. If used again after charging, this ability will release an energy shot that severely lowers the target's attack stat!

disco-fever.name: Disco Fever
disco-fever.description: The user summons a spinning disco ball that hovers in front of the target robot to divert its attention!  As long as the ball keeps spinning, active robots on the opposing team have their damage output cut in half!

rhythm-buster.name: Rhythm Buster
rhythm-buster.description: The user charges to build power and restore a bit of their own life energy. If used again after charging, this ability will release an energy shot that severely lowers the target's speed stat!

rhythm-satellite.name: Rhythm Satellite
rhythm-satellite.description: The user creates a pair of orbiting satellites that hover behind a target and enhance its attacks. This causes the target to deal double damage from attacks for the next six turns.

rolling-cutter.name: Rolling Cutter
rolling-cutter.description: The user throws a boomerang-like blade at any target that strikes up to three times dealing massive damage!

rising-cutter.name: Rising Cutter
rising-cutter.description: The user summons a giant cutter below the target that rises up to inflict massive damage and sharply lower their defense stat!

super-throw.name: Super Throw
super-throw.description: The user waits for an opening and then throws the target across the field to deal damage and potentially force a switch!

super-arm.name: Super Arm
super-arm.description: The user creates a blockade using the surrounding environment to bolster shields and reduce damage by half!  The blockade can also be thrown at the target for massive damage!

ice-breath.name: Ice Breath
ice-breath.description: The user blasts super-chilled air at the target's feet to deal damage and freeze them in place! The target is prevented from switching while frozen in the ice.

ice-slasher.name: Ice Slasher
ice-slasher.description: The user fires a blast of razor-sharp ice at the target to inflict damage and remove any boosts to their speed stat!

hyper-bomb.name: Hyper Bomb
hyper-bomb.description: The user throws a large bomb at the target that explodes for massive damage, occasionally hitting benched robots with the blast at half power!

danger-bomb.name: Danger Bomb
danger-bomb.description: The user throws a powerful bomb toward the target that explodes mid-air to inflict massive damage! This ability sharply lowers the defense stats of both the target and user so detonate with extreme caution.

fire-storm.name: Fire Storm
fire-storm.description: The user surrounds itself in flames then unleashes a blast of fire at the target to deal damage. This ability grows stronger with consecutive use, culminating in a drastic boost to the user's defense stat if uninterrupted.

fire-chaser.name: Fire Chaser
fire-chaser.description: The user unleashes a powerful wave of fire that chases the target to inflict massive damage! This ability deals extra damage to targets with boosted speed stats, growing up to twice as strong when the target is at max speed!

thunder-strike.name: Thunder Strike
thunder-strike.description: The user summons a powerful bolt of electricity from above that crashes into any target to inflict massive damage!

thunder-beam.name: Thunder Beam
thunder-beam.description: The user throws a powerful bolt of electricity at the target to inflict damage, raising its own attack stat in the process!

time-arrow.name: Time Arrow
time-arrow.description: The user directs a mysterious arrow at the target to inflict damage and lower their speed stat!

time-slow.name: Time Slow
time-slow.description: The user charges temporal energy inside itself and then unleashes it on the target to deal damage and sharply lower their speed stat!

oil-shooter.name: Oil Shooter
oil-shooter.description: The user fires a large blob of crude oil at the target's feet to deal damage and make their position on the field vulnerable to Flame and Explode type attacks!

oil-slider.name: Oil Slider
oil-slider.description: The user quickly slides toward the target on a wave of crude oil to inflict damage, raising their own speed stat in the process!

metal-blade.name: Metal Blade
metal-blade.description: The user throws a sharp, disc-like blade in any direction that rips through the target for massive damage!

metal-press.name: Metal Press
metal-press.description: The user summons a giant spike-covered press that drops down on the target at the end of the turn, dealing damage and lowering all stats by one stage!

air-shooter.name: Air Shooter
air-shooter.description: The user generates three small whirlwinds that one-by-one chase after the target to collide and deal damage!

air-twister.name: Air Twister
air-twister.description: The user shields itself with a vortex of high-speed air, cutting the damage from incoming attacks in half!  At the end of the turn, the user unleashes the spinning vortex on the target to deal payback counter damage!

bubble-spray.name: Bubble Spray
bubble-spray.description: The user sprays a thick layer of foamy bubbles at the target's feet to deal damage and make their position on the field vulnerable to Electric and Freeze type attacks!

bubble-lead.name: Bubble Lead
bubble-lead.description: The user creates a super-dense bubble that rolls along the ground until it collides with the target to inflict damage!

quick-strike.name: Quick Strike
quick-strike.description: The user strikes at the target with blinding speed before they have a chance to react, dealing damage and causing them to drop any held items in their possession.  Items dropped this way will not be found until the end of the turn.  This ability always goes first.

quick-boomerang.name: Quick Boomerang
quick-boomerang.description: The user throws a boomerang-like blade at blinding speed toward the target, striking up to four times at increasing strength!

crash-bomber.name: Crash Bomber
crash-bomber.description: The user fires a small explosive that seeks out and latches onto a target, building power for two turn before exploding to deal massive damage!  This ability's damage is unaffected by stats or position variables, making it an excellent tool against benched foes.

crash-avenger.name: Crash Avenger
crash-avenger.description: The user enters a fit of rage and throws a large spike-rimmed explosive at the target to deal damage! This ability grows in power for each disabled ally robot on the user's side of the field.

flash-pulse.name: Flash Pulse
flash-pulse.description: The user sends a temporal shockwave toward at the target, dealing damage and switching to a benched robot while the opponent is distracted by the attack!

flash-stopper.name: Flash Stopper
flash-stopper.description: The user unleashes a flash of temporal energy at the opposing team, dealing damage to all enemy robots!  This ability's base power is divided among all targets, making it stronger the fewer there are.

atomic-fire.name: Atomic Fire
atomic-fire.description: The user engulfs itself in flames then unleashes a volley of fireballs at the target to deal damage. This ability grows stronger with consecutive use, culminating in a drastic boost to the user's attack stat if uninterrupted.

atomic-crasher.name: Atomic Crasher
atomic-crasher.description: The user engulfs itself in flame and rushes full-speed toward the target to inflict damage and lower their speed stat in the process!

leaf-fall.name: Leaf Fall
leaf-fall.description: The user throws a collection of sharp leaf-like blades into the air that drop randomly on opponents to inflict damage!

leaf-shield.name: Leaf Shield
leaf-shield.description: The user surrounds itself with sharp leaf-like blades to bolster shields and reduce damage by half! The leaf blades can also be thrown at the target for massive damage!

needle-cannon.name: Needle Cannon
needle-cannon.description: The user fires a volley of three needle-like projectiles that pierce the target and repeatedly inflict damage!

magnet-missile.name: Magnet Missile
magnet-missile.description: The user fires a large magnet-shaped missile that seeks out its target and collides with it to deal damage! If the target is holding an item and is disabled by this attack, the magnet may return to its user with the item intact!

gemini-clone.name: Gemini Clone
gemini-clone.description: The user generates a clone of itself that fights alongside for up to three turns! The clone automatically mirrors the user's compatible abilities as long as there's enough weapon energy to perform them again!

gemini-laser.name: Gemini Laser
gemini-laser.description: The user fires a powerful laser that bounces back and forth across the battlefield, damaging all target robots until it runs out of power!  To add insult to injury, any targets damaged by this ability will also find their speed lowered!

hard-knuckle.name: Hard Knuckle
hard-knuckle.description: The user fires a powerful but slow-moving fist at the target to deal massive damage and lower their defense stat!

top-spin.name: Top Spin
top-spin.description: The user launches a large, top-shaped weapon at the target that spins around frantically and continues dealing damage until it misses!

search-snake.name: Search Snake
search-snake.description: The user fires a series of three remote-controlled snake robots that seek out any target to deal high damage with perfect accuracy! Damage done by this ability is not affected by distance and can be used even on faraway opponents.

snake-bite.name: Snake Bite
snake-bite.description: The user taps into their inner serpent to strike at the target with the speed and precision of a snake bite.  This attack doesn't deal much damage at first, but it leaves the target with a severe weakness to the user's own type for the rest of the battle.

spark-shock.name: Spark Shock
spark-shock.description: The user lets loose a large ball of electricity at the target to inflict damage and lower their attack stat!

spark-life.name: Spark Life
spark-life.description: The user reawakens the spark of life within a disabled ally by sacrificing half of their own energy reserves.  If the user does not have enough energy to give, however, their efforts will fail.

shadow-blade.name: Shadow Blade
shadow-blade.description: The user throws a dark ninja star at the target to inflict high damage and lower their highest stat!

bright-burst.name: Bright Burst
bright-burst.description: The user generates an intense burst of light that damages the target with ten million watts of power and sharply lowers their attack stat!

rain-flush.name: Rain Flush
rain-flush.description: The user releases a large capsule into the air that showers the field in acid rain and damages all robots on the opponent's side of the battle! This ability's damage is not affected by attack stats, defense stats, or position variables.

drill-blitz.name: Drill Blitz
drill-blitz.description: The user fires off a pair of sharp drills toward the target that deal damage on contact and remove any boosts to their defense stat!

pharaoh-shot.name: Pharaoh Shot
pharaoh-shot.description: The user charges itself with a solar energy that doubles the damage of its own attacks for up to three turns.  If this ability is used again after charging, the held solar energy will instead be released at the target to inflict massive damage!

ring-boomerang.name: Ring Boomerang
ring-boomerang.description: The user throws a large, boomerang-like ring at the target, striking twice with perfect accuracy and inflicting damage each time!

dust-crusher.name: Dust Crusher
dust-crusher.description: The user collects a piece of stage debris with its powerful vacuum and then blasts it at the target for massive damage!

dive-torpedo.name: Dive Torpedo
dive-torpedo.description: The user launches a slow but powerful heat-seeking torpedo at the target to deal massive damage!  If the Water-type field multiplier is high, this ability's base damage is doubled.  If the target is a Water-core robot, this ability's impact damage is doubled.

skull-barrier.name: Skull Barrier
skull-barrier.description: The user surrounds itself with tiny skull-like barriers to bolster shields and prevent all damage from attacks for one turn! The shield can also be thrown at the target for massive damage!

skull-sacrifice.name: Skull Sacrifice
skull-sacrifice.description: The user sacrifices half of their own life force to reanimate a disabled robot on their side of the field.  If the user does not have enough energy to give, however, their efforts will fail.

gravity-hold.name: Gravity Hold
gravity-hold.description: The user intensifies gravity around the target to hold them in place and prevent switching, causing electromagnetic damage in the process!

water-wave.name: Water Wave
water-wave.description: The user attacks by producing up to three pressurized columns of water, each bursting under a different target to deal damage!

power-stone.name: Power Stone
power-stone.description: The user exhumes three large boulders from the earth and swings them around to strike the target, dealing damage and boosting attack after each successful blow!

gyro-attack.name: Gyro Attack
gyro-attack.description: The user throws a giant helicopter blade toward the target that deals damage and then loops around to hit another robot on the way back! Even if this ability misses the first time, there's still a chance the second will hit!

star-crash.name: Star Crash
star-crash.description: The user raises a shield of tiny star-like reflectors and then throws them at a target robot to deal damage up to three times as it spins!

charge-kick.name: Charge Kick
charge-kick.description: The user charges at the target with overwhelming force, dealing substantial damage based upon the speed stat of the user! However, upon use, the user's speed stat will drop a stage.

napalm-bomb.name: Napalm Bomb
napalm-bomb.description: The user rains down on the opposing team with napalm bombs that explode on contact to deal damage!  This ability will continue dropping bombs until all targets are disabled or the user runs out of weapon energy.

crystal-mind.name: Crystal Mind
crystal-mind.description: The user enters a trance-like meditative state and stays there until the end of the turn.  Once the user has completed their meditation, all of their stats are raised either one or two stages depending on whether or not they took damage!

crystal-eye.name: Crystal Eye
crystal-eye.description: The user summons a large crystal orb at that peers into the target's soul to determine and then become its elemental weakness! The large orb is then thrown forward, splitting into smaller fragments on impact and dealing damage to the target and up to two benched robots in the positions behind them!

blizzard-attack.name: Blizzard Attack
blizzard-attack.description: The user summons a powerful blizzard that covers the terrain and damages all robots on the opponent's side of the field!  Any unfortunate robots hit by this frigid attack will also find themselves weak to the Freeze-type for the rest of the battle.

centaur-arrow.name: Centaur Arrow
centaur-arrow.description: The user aims one of its celestial arrows at the target and fires off with incredible precision, dealing preordained damage and causing them to drop any held items in their possession.  Items dropped this way will not be found until the end of the next turn.

centaur-flash.name: Centaur Flash
centaur-flash.description: The user taps into an arcane power within themselves and releases it as a flash of brilliant light across the battlefield.  The energy released by the flash disrupts the natural flow of time for all who bear witness to it, whisking them back to an era when passive skills were not invented yet.

flame-blast.name: Flame Blast
flame-blast.description: The user raises a scorching flame tower below the target that rises twice in quick succession to deal damage!  If the target has any crude oil nearby, this ability will ignite it!

knight-crusher.name: Knight Crusher
knight-crusher.description: The user launches a robust spiked mace towards the target, before suddenly reeling back to strike a second time!

plant-barrier.name: Plant Barrier
plant-barrier.description: The user surrounds itself with a barrier of four large flower petals, each acting independently to protect the user from damage and restore depleted life energy at the end of each turn! Alternatively, you can recall each petal to manually restore life energy. Each petal can only withstand a single attack before fading, however.

silver-tomahawk.name: Silver Tomahawk
silver-tomahawk.description: The user hurls a swirling tomahawk that rises to strike an unfortunate target twice! This ability has the capability to pierce through any barriers the target may be carrying.

wind-storm.name: Wind Storm
wind-storm.description: The user launches a towering torrent of wind at the target, dealing damage and potentially forcing a switch!

yamato-spear.name: Yamato Spear
yamato-spear.description: The user fires small spearheads at the target, completely piercing through any barriers the target is carrying! However, it will continually fire until either the target is disabled or the user runs out of weapon energy.

freeze-cracker.name: Freeze Cracker
freeze-cracker.description: The user fires a snowflake-like projectile at the target that explodes on contact to deal damage.  If this ability is used on a benched robot, the explosion of ice shards can hit adjacent foes as well.

junk-shield.name: Junk Shield
junk-shield.description: The user surrounds itself with large pieces of scrap metal that bolster shields and prevent damage all from one attack!

storm-bolt.name: Storm Bolt
storm-bolt.description: The user discharges a mighty thunder bolt at the target! After striking, the emission from the attack may strike each end of the opponent's bench!

slash-claw.name: Slash Claw
slash-claw.description: The user slashes at the target with razor-sharp claws to inflict damage and worsen any negative stat changes afflicting them!

noise-crush.name: Noise Crush
noise-crush.description: The user generates a powerful sound wave that races toward the target to deal damage!  If this attack happens to miss, it will bounce back and hit the target anyway at twice its usual power!

vamp-crush.name: Vamp Crush
vamp-crush.description: The user flies over to the target and crushes the life force out of them with powerful teeth or claws.  This ability always cuts the target's remaining health in half and cannot be used to disable them, but it returns any drained energy to the user in-full making it a great healing tool.

scorch-wheel.name: Scorch Wheel
scorch-wheel.description: The user creates a wheel of fiery embers that circles around them - once ready, they launch the Scorch Wheel to strike up to three times! If the user is able to successfully hit the opponent three times, their speed stat will raise by two stages.

astro-crush.name: Astro Crush
astro-crush.description: The user creates a meteor storm that rains down on the opponent's side of the field to crush and damage all target robots!  The user's attack stat harshly falls after each use, however.

flame-sword.name: Flame Sword
flame-sword.description: The user severs the opponent with a fiery crescent of sizzling pyrotechnic energy, inflicting damage and removing any positive stat changes benefitting them!

frost-wave.name: Frost Wave
frost-wave.description: The user summons a wave of frozen spikes that race toward the target and collide to inflict damage and lower the target's attack stat! This ability almost always goes first.

flash-bomb.name: Flash Bomb
flash-bomb.description: The user targets the opponent with a flash grenade, emitting a blinding explosion that can strike the enemy for up to three times! Upon three successful strikes, the target's attack stat will drop tremendously.

water-balloon.name: Water Balloon
water-balloon.description: The user pummels the target with water-filled balloons that burst on contact to deal damage!  This ability will continue shooting balloons until either the target is disabled or the user runs out of weapon energy.

dynamo-bolt.name: Dynamo Bolt
dynamo-bolt.description: The user charges themselves with electricity to build power and restore life energy.  If used again after charging this ability can release a storm of lightning bolts on all targets!  Stay healthy, as this ability's power decreases if the user has sustained any damage.

ice-wall.name: Ice Wall
ice-wall.description: The user raises a wall of solid ice to bolster shields and reduce incoming damage by up to half!  Once raised, the ice wall can be pushed forward to collide with the target!  This ability starts up quickly, but is slower on the attack.

remote-mine.name: Remote Mine
remote-mine.description: The user generates a remote-controlled mine and throws it toward the target.  The mine cements itself to the ground and slowly builds power until its eventual detonation.  The user can trigger the mine's explosion at any time, but the longer the wait the greater the damage.

magic-card.name: Magic Card
magic-card.description: The user throws a pair of magical cards at an unlucky target to deal damage and steal life energy, restoring the user's own by up to {RECOVERY2}% of the damage dealt!

tornado-blow.name: Tornado Blow
tornado-blow.description: The user summons a powerful storm of tornados that clear the battlefield of all hazards and protective barriers before rising once again to damage target robots on the opponent's side!

laser-trident.name: Laser Trident
laser-trident.description: The user fires a three-pronged energy beam at the target to inflict damage and remove any positive stat changes benefiting them!

plug-ball.name: Plug Ball
plug-ball.description: The user releases a ball of charged plasma at the target that inflicts damage and disables their passive skill for the next three turns of the battle!

jewel-polish.name: Jewel Polish
jewel-polish.description: The user buffs and polishes itself or an ally to instantly reset any negative stat changes that may have been applied!  This ability can also remove field hazards around the target provided there's enough weapon energy to do so!

jewel-satellite.name: Jewel Satellite
jewel-satellite.description: The user surrounds itself with an orbit of four large diamonds, each acting as a separate shield and slightly reducing incoming damage!  All four diamonds represent a different elemental type and each grant the user total immunity to that type one time before being destroyed.  Any remaining diamonds can be thrown at a target for decent damage!

hornet-chaser.name: Hornet Chaser
hornet-chaser.description: The user releases a small robotic drone that races across the battlefield to sting the target and deal damage!  If the target is holding a consumable item, the drone will steal it from them instantly and return it to the user instead!

galaxy-bomb.name: Galaxy Bomb
galaxy-bomb.description: The user fires a small gravity bomb that implodes in front of the target to form a powerful black hole! The black hole lasts for five turns and deals damage to any active robot at the end of each!

water-shield.name: Water Shield
water-shield.description: The user surrounds itself with an orbit of eight large water droplets, each acting as a separate shield and the reducing the damage from incoming attacks!  Each droplet can only withstand a single attack before fading, but any remaining ones can be thrown at the target for decent damage!

commando-bomb.name: Commando Bomb
commando-bomb.description: The user fires a missile at the target that explodes on contact to deal damage. However, if this ability is used on a benched robot, it launches into a large shockwave that strikes adjacent foes for almost double the ability power!

chill-spike.name: Chill Spike
chill-spike.description: The user fires a glob of freezing gel at the target that instantly chills into jagged ice below their feet!  The frozen spikes deal damage at the end of each turn for up to twelve turns!

thunder-wool.name: Thunder Wool
thunder-wool.description: The user launches a thunderous wool-cloud into the air that slowly rises and then floats toward an unlucky target! The cloud hovers in place for three turns and releases a lightning strike at the end of each to damage any robot underneath!

wheel-cutter.name: Wheel Cutter
wheel-cutter.description: The user sets a spinning blade onto the ground to beeline straight through the opponent! If the user is fast enough, they can set up multiple Wheel Cutters to chase after the opponent!

solar-blaze.name: Solar Blaze
solar-blaze.description: The user fires a flame-based explosive at the target that hovers in the middle of the field and waits to absorb energy from attacks.  At the end of the turn, the explosive detonates to deal massive counter damage to the target!

block-dropper.name: Block Dropper
block-dropper.description: The user generates up to four construction blocks out of thin air and then drops them randomly on opponents to inflict damage!

scramble-thunder.name: Scramble Thunder
scramble-thunder.description: The user unleashes crackling bolts of electricity that speed along the ground until they hit their targets at each end of the opponent's bench!  If this ability homes in on a single target in the middle of the field, it can hit the target twice!

chain-blast.name: Chain Blast
chain-blast.description: The user generates a multi-faceted explosive that attaches itself to a target after being thrown.  The explosive automatically detonates after one turn but can be chained with additional copies to increase the duration and power of it and any others currently on the field.

acid-glob.name: Acid Glob
acid-glob.description: The user fires a large glob of corrosive acid at the target's feet that deals damage at the end of each turn for up to nine turns! This ability can be used without weapon energy and at increased power if the user is currently protected by an Acid Barrier!

acid-barrier.name: Acid Barrier
acid-barrier.description: The user surrounds itself in a protective bubble of corrosive acid that reduces damage from incoming attacks for up to nine turns!  As long as the user is protected by this bubble, the Acid Glob ability can be used at increased power and without consuming any weapon energy!

tundra-spin.name: Tundra Spin
tundra-spin.description: The user glides toward the target at high speed with ice underfoot, colliding with them on impact to deal moderate damage and then spinning around for a second hit!  This ability always loops back at least once, but if the Freeze-type field multiplier is high enough, it'll inspire the user to continue spinning out additional damage.

tundra-storm.name: Tundra Storm
tundra-storm.description: The user blasts the target with a pillar of frigid wind, covering them in ice that instantly shatters to deal massive damage!  If the user's attack stat has been maxed out, the storm will rage on to strike benched robots as well.

bounce-ball.name: Bounce Ball
bounce-ball.description: The user throws out a fast-moving trio of bouncy balls, which'll rebound around the field to hit three random targets on the other side of the bench!

barrier-drive.name: Barrier Drive
barrier-drive.description: The robot uses its powers to pull Core Shields near-and-far toward itself and then throws them at the target for critical damage. This ability's effects are not hindered by positional modifiers, but a lack of available shields can certainly render it useless.

lunar-memory.name: Lunar Memory
lunar-memory.description: The user taps into a near-forgotten memory to generate an otherworldly object in front of itself.  The spherical curiosity protects the user completely from the damage of one attack before vanishing.

shield-eater.name: Shield Eater
shield-eater.description: The robot uses its powers to pull Core Shields near-and-far toward itself and then absorbs them to heal battle damage.  This ability's effects allow the user to sustain itself for prolonged engagements, but a lack of available shields can certainly render it useless.

grab-buster.name: Grab Buster
grab-buster.description: The user emits a siphoning energy attack at the target to deal damage and steal life energy, restoring the user's own by up to {RECOVERY2}% of the damage dealt!

bubble-bomb.name: Bubble Bomb
bubble-bomb.description: The user throws a large bubble at the target that explodes on contact to cause damage and remove any boosts to their attack stat!

photon-missile.name: Photon Missile
photon-missile.description: The user fires a missile made from materials unknown; it delays before locking onto a target, and then suddenly sets off for massive damage!

magnetic-shockwave.name: Magnetic Shockwave
magnetic-shockwave.description: The user generates an interdimensional geomagnetic force that will always strike the opponent three times!

core-shield.name: Core Shield
core-shield.description: The user generates an elemental barrier around itself or an ally that protects it from virtually all damage matching the user's core type!  If the user is holding a secondary elemental core when this ability is triggered, two shields will be generated instead of just one!

core-laser.name: Core Laser
core-laser.description: The user releases an elemental beam that burns through the target's armor to deal damage. This ability's typing appears to be influenced by the energy of nearby cores.

omega-pulse.name: Omega Pulse
omega-pulse.description: The user taps into its hidden power to generate a pulse of elemental energy. This ability's type appears to differ between robots.

omega-wave.name: Omega Wave
omega-wave.description: The user taps into their hidden power to generate a wave of elemental energy. This ability's types appear to differ between player-robot combinations.

light-buster.name: Light Buster
light-buster.description: The user charges to build power and raise their own defense stat. If used again after charging, this ability will release a powerful energy shot that inflicts massive damage!  Dr. Light's robots are especially good at using this move.

wily-buster.name: Wily Buster
wily-buster.description: The user charges to build power and raise their own attack stat. If used again after charging, this ability will release a powerful energy shot that inflicts massive damage! Dr. Wily's robots are especially good at using this move.

cossack-buster.name: Cossack Buster
cossack-buster.description: The user charges to build power and raise their own speed stat. If used again after charging, this ability will release a powerful energy shot that inflicts massive damage! Dr. Cossack's robots are especially good at using this move.

cutter-shot.name: Cutter Shot
cutter-shot.description: The user fires a small blade shot at the target to inflict Cutter type damage. This ability's power increases if the user if holding a buster charge of the same element, and can fire multiple shots depending on how much faster the user is than their opponent.

cutter-buster.name: Cutter Buster
cutter-buster.description: The user charges itself with Cutter type energy on the first turn to increase its elemental abilities, then releases a powerful blade shot at the target on the second to inflict massive damage!

cutter-overdrive.name: Cutter Overdrive
cutter-overdrive.description: The user releases all of their stored weapon energy at once in a powerful storm of blade shots, dealing Cutter type damage to all targets on the opponent's side of the field.  This ability's power is directly proportionate to the amount of life energy the user has lost, making it most effective when used in critical condition.

impact-shot.name: Impact Shot
impact-shot.description: The user fires a small crushing shot at the target to inflict Impact type damage. This ability's power increases if the user if holding a buster charge of the same element, and can fire multiple shots depending on how much faster the user is than their opponent.

impact-buster.name: Impact Buster
impact-buster.description: The user charges itself with Impact type energy on the first turn to increase its elemental abilities, then releases a powerful crushing shot at the target on the second to inflict massive damage!

impact-overdrive.name: Impact Overdrive
impact-overdrive.description: The user releases all of their stored weapon energy at once in a powerful storm of crushing shots, dealing Impact type damage to all targets on the opponent's side of the field.  This ability's power is directly proportionate to the amount of life energy the user has lost, making it most effective when used in critical condition.

freeze-buster.name: Freeze Buster
freeze-buster.description: The user charges itself with Freeze type energy on the first turn to increase its elemental abilities, then releases a powerful ice shot at the target on the second to inflict massive damage!

freeze-overdrive.name: Freeze Overdrive

This ability's power is directly proportionate to the amount of life energy the user has lost, making it most effective when used in critical condition.

explode-buster.name: Explode Buster

shield-buster.name: Shield Buster
shield-buster.description: The user charges itself with Shield type energy on the first turn to increase its elemental abilities, then releases a powerful barrier shot at the target on the second to inflict massive damage!

shield-overdrive.name: Shield Overdrive

This ability's power is directly proportionate to the amount of life energy the user has lost, making it most effective when used in critical condition.

laser-shot.name: Laser Shot
laser-shot.description: The user fires a small beam shot at the target to inflict Laser type damage. This ability's power increases if the user if holding a buster charge of the same element, and can fire multiple shots depending on how much faster the user is than their opponent.

laser-buster.name: Laser Buster
laser-buster.description: The user charges itself with Laser type energy on the first turn to increase its elemental abilities, then releases a powerful beam shot at the target on the second to inflict massive damage!

laser-overdrive.name: Laser Overdrive
laser-overdrive.description: The user releases all of their stored weapon energy at once in a powerful storm of beam shots, dealing Laser type damage to all targets on the opponent's side of the field.  This ability's power is directly proportionate to the amount of life energy the user has lost, making it most effective when used in critical condition.

copy-shot.name: Copy Shot
copy-shot.description: The user fires a small emulation device at the target that deals damage and copies its last ability to the user for the rest of the battle! This ability cannot be used to copy abilities by support mecha or fortress bosses so use with great care.

copy-soul.name: Copy Soul
copy-soul.description: The user summons a large capsule-like device behind the target that drains their energy to deal damage! Under the right conditions, the energy collected by the device can be converted into a new elemental shield and even a whole new core!

copy-style.name: Copy Style
copy-style.description: The user summons a large futuristic-looking device behind the target that drains their energy to deal damage! If the user can land a knockout with this ability, the energy collected by the device may transform them into a near-perfect copy of the target!

energy-boost.name: Energy Boost
energy-boost.description: The user manually repairs its own body to restore life energy by up to {RECOVERY}%! When used by a support robot, this ability can optionally restore an ally instead of the user!

energy-break.name: Energy Break
energy-break.description: The user bypasses the target's shields to deal direct life energy damage of up to {DAMAGE}%! When used by a support robot, this ability can optionally target the bench instead of the active position!

energy-swap.name: Energy Swap
energy-swap.description: The user triggers an exploit in the prototype's code to instantly swap their own life energy with the target! When used by a support robot, this ability will swap with allies instead of the enemy!

energy-support.name: Energy Support
energy-support.description: The user triggers system repairs for all robots on their side of the field to boost life energy by up to {RECOVERY}% each!

energy-assault.name: Energy Assault
energy-assault.description: The user triggers system breaks for all robots on the target's side of the field to lower life energy by up to {DAMAGE}% each!

energy-mode.name: Energy Mode
energy-mode.description: The user harshly lowers its own attack, defense, and speed stats in exchange for fully recovering life energy and returning to perfect health!

attack-boost.name: Attack Boost
attack-boost.description: The user optimizes internal systems to improve weapons and sharply raise their attack stat! This ability's range is extended when used by a support robot or mecha to allow targeting an ally instead.

attack-break.name: Attack Break
attack-break.description: The user breaks down the target's weapon systems to sharply lower their attack stat! This ability's range is extended when used by a support robot or mecha to allow targeting the bench instead.

attack-swap.name: Attack Swap
attack-swap.description: The user triggers an exploit in the prototype's code to instantly swap changes to its attack stat with the target! When used by a support robot, this ability will swap with allies instead of the enemy!

attack-support.name: Attack Support
attack-support.description: The user triggers weapon optimizations for all robots on their side of the field to raise their attack stats! This ability requires a lot of weapon energy and isn't compatible with many robots.

attack-assault.name: Attack Assault
attack-assault.description: The user triggers weapon damage to all robots on the target's side of the field to lower their attack stats! This ability requires a lot of weapon energy and isn't compatible with many robots.

attack-mode.name: Attack Mode
attack-mode.description: The user harshly lowers its own defense and speed stats in exchange for a maxed-out attack stat to improve weapons! However, the weapon energy cost for this ability increases after each use.

defense-boost.name: Defense Boost
defense-boost.description: The user optimizes internal systems to improve shields and sharply raise their defense stat! This ability's range is extended when used by a support robot or mecha to allow targeting an ally instead.

defense-break.name: Defense Break
defense-break.description: The user breaks down the target's shield systems to sharply lower their defense stat! This ability's range is extended when used by a support robot or mecha to allow targeting the bench instead.

defense-swap.name: Defense Swap
defense-swap.description: The user triggers an exploit in the prototype's code to instantly swap changes to its defense stat with the target! When used by a support robot, this ability will swap with allies instead of the enemy!

defense-support.name: Defense Support
defense-support.description: The user triggers shield optimizations for all robots on their side of the field to raise their defense stats! This ability requires a lot of weapon energy and isn't compatible with many robots.

defense-assault.name: Defense Assault
defense-assault.description: The user triggers shield damage to all robots on the target's side of the field to lower their defense stats! This ability requires a lot of weapon energy and isn't compatible with many robots.

defense-mode.name: Defense Mode
defense-mode.description: The user harshly lowers its own attack and speed stats in exchange for a maxed-out defense stat to improve shields! However, the weapon energy cost for this ability increases after each use.

speed-boost.name: Speed Boost
speed-boost.description: The user optimizes internal systems to improve mobility and sharply raise their speed stat! This ability's range is extended when used by a support robot or mecha to allow targeting an ally instead.

speed-break.name: Speed Break
speed-break.description: The user breaks down the target's mobility systems to sharply lower their speed stat! This ability's range is extended when used by a support robot or mecha to allow targeting the bench instead.

speed-swap.name: Speed Swap
speed-swap.description: The user triggers an exploit in the prototype's code to instantly swap changes to its speed stat with the target! When used by a support robot, this ability will swap with allies instead of the enemy!

speed-support.name: Speed Support
speed-support.description: The user triggers mobility optimizations for all robots on their side of the field to raise their speed stats! This ability requires a lot of weapon energy and isn't compatible with many robots.

speed-assault.name: Speed Assault
speed-assault.description: The user triggers mobility damage to all robots on the target's side of the field to lower their speed stats! This ability requires a lot of weapon energy and isn't compatible with many robots.

speed-mode.name: Speed Mode
speed-mode.description: The user harshly lowers its own attack and defense stats in exchange for a maxed-out speed stat to improve mobility! However, the weapon energy cost for this ability increases after each use.

item-swap.name: Item Swap
item-swap.description: The user triggers an exploit in the prototype's code to instantly swap their held item with the target! When used by a support robot, this ability will swap with allies instead of the enemy!

damage-booster.name: Damage Booster
damage-booster.description: The user alters the conditions of the field to boost the damaging effects of abilities by {RECOVERY}%! This ability appears to be unaffected by existing field multipliers.

damage-breaker.name: Damage Breaker
damage-breaker.description: The user alters the conditions of the field to lower the damaging effects of abilities by {DAMAGE}%! This ability appears to be unaffected by existing field multipliers.

recovery-booster.name: Recovery Booster
recovery-booster.description: The user alters the conditions of the field to boost the recovery effects of abilities by 30%! This ability appears to be unaffected by existing field multipliers.

recovery-breaker.name: Recovery Breaker
recovery-breaker.description: The user alters the conditions of the field to lower the recovery effects of abilities by {DAMAGE}%! This ability appears to be unaffected by existing field multipliers.

experience-booster.name: Experience Booster
experience-booster.description: The user alters the conditions of the field to double the amount of experience points earned in this battle!

experience-breaker.name: Experience Breaker
experience-breaker.description: The user alters the conditions of the field to halve the amount of experience points earned in this battle!

field-support.name: Field Support
field-support.description: The user increases the field multiplier matching their own core type and then lowers the field multipliers matching their weaknesses, tilting the odds in their favour! However, the weapon energy cost for this ability increases after each use and it works differently for Neutral and Copy Core robots.

mecha-support.name: Mecha Support
mecha-support.description: The user summons a familiar support mecha to the benched position, allowing the new robot to fight alongside the team for the rest of the battle!  The weapon energy required to perform this technique increases after each summon, and will fail completely if there isn't enough room in the party.

mecha-assault.name: Mecha Assault
mecha-assault.description: The user summons a familiar support mecha to the active position, allowing the new robot to immediately attack and then fight alongside the team for the rest of the battle!  The weapon energy required to perform this technique increases after each summon, and will fail completely if there isn't enough room in the party.

mecha-party.name: Mecha Party
mecha-party.description: The user forms a small party of familiar support mecha and positions them on the bench, allowing the new robots to fight alongside the team for the rest of the battle!  The weapon energy required to perform this technique increases after each summon, and will fail completely if there isn't enough room left in the party.

friend-share.name: Friend Share
friend-share.description: The user kindly shares their stats boosts with the target hoping to make a friend.  The more stat boosts shared this way, the more friendly the target robot will become towards the user.

energy-fist.name: Energy Fist
energy-fist.description: The user unleashes a giant, lightspeed energy fist at the target to inflict massive damage and eliminate all stat buffs!

dark-boost.name: Dark Boost
dark-boost.description: The user cloaks themselves in dark energy to instantly boost their worst stat to its max level!  Take care not to use this ability in battle.  If the user's core is anything but empty, the darkness will overwhelm them and cut their remaining life energy in half!

dark-break.name: Dark Break
dark-break.description: The user cloaks the target in dark energy to instantly drop their best stat to its lowest level!  Take care not to use this ability in battle.  If the user's core is anything but empty, the darkness will overwhelm them and cut their remaining life energy in half!

dark-drain.name: Dark Drain
dark-drain.description: The user manipulates dark energy to drain the target's best stat to its lowest level while boosting their own worst stat by the same amount! Take care not to use this ability in battle.  If the user's core is anything but empty, the darkness will overwhelm them and cut their remaining life energy to a single point!

dive-blitzkrieg.name: Dive Blitzkrieg
dive-blitzkrieg.description: The user summons a storm of heat-seeking missiles upon the target dealing massive damage to it and all other robots on the opponent's side of the field!

sticky-bond.name: Sticky Bond
sticky-bond.description: The user attaches a large glob of sticky glue to the target that deals damage and prevents switching for three turns!

sticky-shot.name: Sticky Shot
sticky-shot.description: The user fires a large glob of sticky glue at the target that deals damage and lowers speed by 20%!

attack-shuffle.name: Attack Shuffle
attack-shuffle.description: The user triggers a dangerous glitch in the prototype that randomly increases or decreases their own attack stat!

defense-shuffle.name: Defense Shuffle
defense-shuffle.description: The user triggers a dangerous glitch in the prototype that randomly increases or decreases their own defense stat!

energy-shuffle.name: Energy Shuffle
energy-shuffle.description: The user triggers a dangerous glitch in the prototype that randomizes their randomly restores or depletes their life energy stat!

speed-shuffle.name: Speed Shuffle
speed-shuffle.description: The user triggers a dangerous glitch in the prototype that randomly increases or decreases their own speed stat!

repair-mode.name: Repair Mode
repair-mode.description: The user lowers its attack, defense, and speed by {DAMAGE}% to repair damaged systems and recovery up to {RECOVERY}% energy!
